name: CapturetheFlag(CTF)Facts
0:
”Alexa open Capture the Flag facts”
”Alexa ask Capture the Flag facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell Capture the Flag facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: capture the flag facts
des:
Ask Alexa to talk to CTF Facts, and learn new tips on how to improve your skills in Capture the Flag security competitions.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Capture the Flag Facts" or "Alexa, open Capture the Flag Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
